caption: Relating to an annual report on the costs to this state and political subdivisions of providing health care services to foreign patients.
undersanding:
Summary:
This bill requires public hospitals in Texas to collect and report costs of providing inpatient and emergency healthcare services to uninsured non-US citizens and non-permanent residents. Chinese nationals without US citizenship or permanent residency who receive healthcare at public hospitals in Texas will be affected, as their treatment costs will be tracked and reported. The hospitals must inform these patients about the reporting requirement but cannot deny care based on immigration status.

中文总结：
该法案要求德克萨斯州的公立医院收集并报告向无保险的非美国公民和非永久居民提供住院和急诊医疗服务的成本。在德州公立医院就医的中国公民（非美国公民或永久居民）将受到影响，因为他们的治疗费用将被追踪和报告。医院必须告知这些病人相关报告要求，但不能因移民身份而拒绝提供医疗服务。
